entries.journal_entry_description: An Imperial Star Destroyer has gone renegade. You have been recruited to find it and gain control of it.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to any starport ticket droid and ask for the location of an Imperial escape pod that has recently turned up and been registered as abandoned.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Travel to the escape pod from the Star Destroyer and investigate. It has been tracked to Yavin IV.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Reconfigure the flight recorder so that you learn what information it holds.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The flight recorder reveals that former Imperial Captain Sait has taken control of the Star Destroyer and seeks to sell it to the Black Sun.
entries.task03_message_box_text: The flight recorder reveals that former Imperial Captain Sait has taken control of the Star Destroyer and seeks to sell it to the Black Sun.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: So the Black Sun plan to purchase the Star Destroyer. Good to know. First things first, though. Let's find out where they've taken the Star Destroyer. Go to one of their hideouts and see what you can find.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: "So the Black Sun plan to purchase the Star Destroyer. Good to know. First things first, though. Let's find out where they've taken the Star Destroyer. Go to one of their hideouts and see what you can find."
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Captain Sait is looking to sell the Star Destroyer to the Black Sun. Go to a Black Sun stronghold on Endor and fight Black Sun members there until you find a datapad revealing the location of the renegade Star Destroyer.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Return to Aurilia and speak with Hirael Chindiaye.
